hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT 1 AS ORDERS FROM EO_ORDER EOOR WHERE 1 = 1 <<AND EOOR.EOOR_LOGISTIC_NO LIKE :eoorLogisticNo>> <<AND EOOR.EOOR_CUSTOMER_CODE LIKE :eoorCustomerCode>> <<AND EOOR.EOOR_CONSIGNEE_CODE LIKE :eoorConsigneeCode>> <<AND EOOR.ORG_ID = :orgId>> <<and (eoor.eoor_meger_flag = nvl(:eoorMegerFlag,'') or eoor.eoor_meger_flag is null)>> <<and eoor.eoor_split_flag is not null and eoor.eoor_id != :eoorId>>
